title: Talentwunder
description: Talentwunder is Google for recruitment - it leverage ai, big data and social network analysis to help companies find the best talent.

title: telewebber
description: Social layer for linear tv - connecting people watching the same tv-shows. Business model was market research and a matching ad format on the second screen called realtime crossmedia advertising. Acquired by Zattoo.

title: Fachangebot
description: Algorithmically optimized and personalized landingpage and Google ads to reach a massive perfomance lift for lead generation of high-involvement product.

title: KlickHelden
description: Internet marketing agency specializing on Google ads optimization and social media marketing.

title: hack.institute
description: Innovation agency that organized hackathons for corporates and the communtiy. This helped with recruiting as well as product- and partner development. Customers included Bosch, Postbank, HRS and many more. Acquired by Quadriga Hochschule.

title: Full Screen Mirror
description: The digital equivalent of the makeup mirror. First of its kind and still out there.

title: Goldesel Trading & Investing
description: Goldesel is one of the most active communities for stock traders in Germany with its own mobile App. Supporting the founder on his journey.

title: Humify
description: Humify is transforming biomass into humic substance to capture and store carbon while reversing soil degradation on a global scale. Max-Planck Innovation deep-tech spin-off.

title: Active Sourcing Award
description: The award for active sourcing in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. Awarded at the largest HR fair in Europe, Zukunft Personal.

title: Clipsay
description: Mobile phone app to record and send short video clips to each other and the public. Sort of an early version of TikTok.

title: Insiderkauf
description: Free website that analyzes and visually displays the stock trades of company insiders who are obligated to report those.
